name: MOTHER (itch) (Loulaty)
description:
Check the cinematic here : 


The player finds himself immersed in the dream of Léane, 9 years old who has just learned of the death of her mother and who does not realize that everything she lives is a dream, at her young age she still struggles to really understand the principle of death and just think that her mother was taken by the grim reaper to take away her memories. 

She will therefore do everything to try to find her to bring her back to her side and never forget her.  The game takes place in the child's imagination, it is a very dark world which represents the nightmare in itself, the general atmosphere is rather calm but scary. The decor can range from a night forest to a dilapidated school, passing through more imaginative worlds (such as large stairs or phases in the air)  

   Léane is a 9-year-old, gentle, motivated, full of imagination. She is appreciated by other children and has a small family made up of her father, mother and maternal grandfather, a small but tight-knit family. She is in fourth grade and very studious, she loves reading and creating stories, the other students and the professionals of the school love her for that. Her favorite object is a bubble bottle, which her mom gave her for her birthday and taught her how to make bubbles of all different sizes and shapes. Since then she brings it wherever she goes.
